p: Targeted screening of incoming travelers arriving from affected countries was implemented in five countries for Influenza Pandemic (H1N1) 2009 [ 21, 24, 26, 33, 39]. Six countries implemented massive general screening to all inbound travelers arriving at the airport for SARS and for Influenza Pandemic (H1N1) 2009, as well as for Dengue fever and Chikungunya infection [ 8, 9, 10, 15, 20, 29, 32, 35, 36, 40]. In one report the type of screening is not clearly described [ 28].
